en.sc2: Check if Price is greater than 100 it evaluates true and prints (Price is greater than 100) otherwise it will check another condition.
en.sc3: Check if Price is equal to 100 it evaluates true and prints (Price is 100) otherwise it will check another condition.
en.sc4: Check if Price is smaller than 100 (No need for another else cause the Price must be smaller , greater or equal to 100)
